mapper.sql: cf.Id , cf.UserId , cf.Content , cf.PicUrl , cf.Source , cf.InsertBy , cf.InsertDate , cf.UpdateBy , cf.UpdateDate , cf.Remarks , cf.DelFlag, u.Id AS "user.Id" , u.Username AS "user.Username" , u.Password AS "user.Password" , u.Name AS "user.Name" , u.Nickname AS "user.Nickname" , u.Email AS "user.Email" , u.Phone AS "user.Phone" , u.Photo AS "user.Photo" , u.CompanyId AS "user.CompanyId" , u.IsCompany AS "user.IsCompany" , u.LoginIp AS "user.LoginIp" , u.LoginName AS "user.LoginName" , u.LoginTime AS "user.LoginTime" , u.Status AS "user.Status" , u.IsLogin AS "user.IsLogin" , u.InsertBy AS "user.InsertBy" , u.InsertDate AS "user.InsertDate", u.UpdateBy AS "user.UpdateBy" , u.UpdateDate AS "user.UpdateDate", u.Remarks AS "user.Remarks", u.DelFlag AS "user.DelFlag"
mapper.select: SELECT FROM gg_user u, gg_circle_friends cf WHERE cf.UserId = #{userId} AND cf.DelFlag = '1' AND u.Id = cf.UserId ORDER BY cf.InsertDate DESC

SELECT FROM gg_circle_friends cf, gg_user u WHERE cf.UserId in ( SELECT UserId FROM gg_fans WHERE FansId = #{userId} AND DelFlag = '1' ) AND cf.DelFlag = '1' AND cf.UserId = u.Id ORDER BY cf.InsertDate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gg_circle_friends ( UserId , Content , PicUrl , Source , InsertBy , InsertDate , UpdateBy , UpdateDate , Remarks , DelFlag ) VALUES ( #{userId} , #{content} , #{picUrl} , #{source} , #{insertBy} , #{insertDate} , #{updateBy} , #{updateDate} , #{remarks} , #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE gg_circle_friends SET PicUrl = #{picUrl} WHERE Id = #{id} AND DelFlag = #{delFlag}
UPDATE gg_circle_friends SET DeleFlag = '0' WHERE Id = #{id} AND UserId = #{userId}
